article_title: Community Health Systems (CYH) Stock Lower on Rating Downgrade
article_text:
10 Stocks Billionaire David Einhorn Loves in 2016

David Einhorn is a man of many talents, including playing poker -- and watching where he stacks his chips investment-wise is a worthwhile endeavor, too.

article_metadata.description: Community Health Systems (CYH) stock is falling in early morning trading on Tuesday, after a downgrade to 'market perform' from 'outperform' and a price target cut at Leerink this morning.
article_metadata.author: Rachel Graf
